description: ICT Smart Money Concept strategy using Kill Zones, Fair Value Gaps, and Order Blocks adapted for WZRD MTF analysis

signals.reason: London Kill Zone entry: Fair Value Gap identified with Order Block confluence and 1hr EMA confirmation
Reached next liquidity zone - profit taking at resistance
New York AM Kill Zone: Market Structure Shift confirmed with deviation band support
Order Block exhaustion - institutional selling pressure detected
New York PM Kill Zone: Liquidity sweep with MTF confirmation
Fair Value Gap filled - target reached

entry_conditions.description: ICT Kill Zone entry with Fair Value Gap and Order Block confluence
entry_conditions.condition: EMA9_5min > EMA20_5min AND previous_EMA9_5min <= previous_EMA20_5min AND EMA9_1h > EMA20_1h AND Low_1h <= DevBand72_1h_Lower_6

entry_conditions.description: Market Structure Shift with MTF confirmation during Kill Zones
entry_conditions.condition: EMA9_5min > EMA20_5min AND previous_EMA9_5min <= previous_EMA20_5min AND EMA9_1h > EMA20_1h AND EMA9_1D > EMA20_1D

entry_conditions.description: ICT Liquidity Sweep for short entries during afternoon Kill Zone
entry_conditions.condition: EMA9_5min < EMA20_5min AND previous_EMA9_5min >= previous_EMA20_5min AND High_1h >= DevBand72_1h_Upper_6

exit_conditions.description: ICT target at next liquidity zone
Order Block exhaustion - institutional pressure reversal
Fair Value Gap filled - target reached

london_session.description: London Kill Zone - High institutional activity

new_york_am.description: New York AM Kill Zone - Market open volatility

new_york_pm.description: New York PM Kill Zone - Afternoon institutional moves

fair_value_gaps.identification: Three candle pattern with gap between wicks
fair_value_gaps.entry_strategy: Wait for retest of FVG area with confluence factors
fair_value_gaps.target: Next liquidity zone or opposite FVG

order_blocks.bullish_ob: Last down candle before market structure break higher
order_blocks.bearish_ob: Last up candle before market structure break lower
order_blocks.entry_strategy: Retest of Order Block with price rejection

smart_money_concepts.liquidity_sweep: Price moves to collect stops above/below key levels
smart_money_concepts.market_structure_shift: Break of previous high/low confirming trend change
smart_money_concepts.institutional_order_flow: Large volume moves indicating smart money participation
